sponsors.name: Twilio
sponsors.description: Twilio is a cloud communications platform that allows software developers to programmatically make and receive phone calls, send and receive text messages, and perform other communication funcitons using its web service APIs.

sponsors.name: Stockora
sponsors.description: Stockora is an API-first stock data and public company newswire. An official partner to the London Stock Exchange, Stockora provides low-latency data feeds and machine learning derived company insights.
